PvE: Model 8 Red + Tac/Appended Mag + Threat Detector + OfA/KC
The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range.

PvP: Model 8 Red + Accurized + KW/DSR/Qd + KC/Iron Reach
The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range.

PvP: Hitmark/Steadyhand + High cal/Ricochet/Light Mag + Killing Wind/Moving Target/Qd + Swash/Wellspring/Snap/Iron Grip
When using Iron Grip, make sure you run a handcanon loader mod. This returns you to the base reload of the weapon and make sure you lose nothing

PvE: Hard/Quick + Spikes + FieldPrep/ALH + Ambitious Assassin
Spike grenades benefit from reduced blast radius as that shifts more damage to impact damage. Velocity barrels are acceptable, but avoid Confined Launch and Volatile Launch if using spike grenades.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + Proximity Nades + Threat Detector + Quickdraw/Rampage
Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + Proximity Nades + Threat Detector + Quickdraw/Rampage
Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats.

PvE: any + tac/appended/flared/alloy + Surplus/ALH + Rampage/MKC/Wellspring/Unrelenting
This weapon has the same bugged reticle as Gridskipper (it moves a whole lot as you strafe). It may bother you, it may not. But if the weapon feels off, that is why.
